compress-images-using-tinypng-api-to-red: A user-friendly image compression toolkit that helps you reduce image file sizes while maintaining quality using advanced compression algorithms.
Compress images using TinyPNG API to reduce file size while maintaining quality
path-to-the-input-image-file-png-jpg-or-: Path to the input image file (PNG, JPG, or WebP)
path-for-the-compressed-output-image-opt: Path for the compressed output image (optional, auto-generated if null)
bulkly-compress-the-pictures-in-a-folder: Bulkly compress the pictures in a folder and save them to the target folder specified by the user.
bulk-compress-images-in-a-folder-and-sav: Bulk compress images in a folder and save them to the target directory
source-folder-containing-images-to-compr: Source folder containing images to compress
destination-folder-for-compressed-images: Destination folder for compressed images (optional, defaults to source folder)
